Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.fragment

Class DynamicThemeFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.fragment.DynamicFragment
        • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.fragment.ThemeFragment<DynamicAppTheme>
          • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.fragment.DynamicThemeFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.core.view.MenuProvider, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, DynamicLifecycle, DynamicSearchListener, DynamicTransitionListener, ThemeListener<DynamicAppTheme>, ThemeListener.Export<DynamicAppTheme>, ThemeListener.Import<DynamicAppTheme>
    public class DynamicThemeFragment
extends ThemeFragment<DynamicAppTheme>
    Base theme fragment to provide theme editing functionality.

    Extend this fragment to implement theme attributes according to the requirements.

      • onSetAction

        public void onSetAction​(int themeAction,
                        @Nullable
                        ThemePreview<DynamicAppTheme> themePreview,
                        boolean enable)
        Description copied from interface: ThemeListener
        This method will be called on setting the action icon.

        It can be used to change the action icon while sharing the theme.

        Parameters:
        themeAction - The theme action to be used.
        themePreview - The theme preview to set the share action.
        enable - true to enable the share action.
